definitions: To trim (a tree, shrub, or bush) by cutting away dead or overgrown branches or stems, especially to improve growth or appearance.
To reduce (something) by removing superfluous or unwanted parts.
To remove (superfluous or unwanted parts) from something.
examples: She needs to prune the rose bushes.
The editor will prune the article for brevity.
We should prune away the dead branches.
